duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Chief Technology Officer in technology development, feature development, and maintenance of Sunsett.io.
Execute technology development strategy and scale product development based on directives of Chief Technology Officer.
Hands-on data structuring, logic-design, and code development.
Execute research and technical proof-of-concept initiatives, as well as write, organize, and maintain code based on designs.
Co-develop functional leadership and mentorship for the engineering and data science team.
Assist in recruiting, hiring, and onboarding new engineering and data science team members.

skills.skill: Front-end and back-end development in React (Next.js) and Laravel
Proficiency in Hubspot, Mixpanel, AWS, Stripe, Heroku & Bugsnag
Integration of external APIs including Eventbrite, Google Analytics, and Shopify

education_certification.credential: Bachelor degree (BS) in Computer Science/Engineering, other technical major or equivalent professional experience.
